member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CharacterDisplay
member.summary: A CharacterDisplay module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CharacterDisplay.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CharacterDisplay.Print(System.String)
member.summary: Prints the passed in string to the screen at the current cursor position. A newline character (\n) will move the cursor to the start of the next row.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CharacterDisplay.Print(System.Char)
member.summary: Prints a character to the screen at the current cursor position. A newline character (\n) will move the cursor to the start of the next row.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CharacterDisplay.CursorHome
member.summary: Places the cursor at the top left of the screen.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CharacterDisplay.SetCursorPosition(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the cursor to given position.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CharacterDisplay.BacklightEnabled
member.summary: Whether or not the backlight is enabled.
